Shimla is the most popular hill station of India and it is the capital of the state Himachal Pradesh. Shimla has come into light when britishers explored it in 1819, Shimla is a place which gives the best view of the valleys and lofty peaks of the himalayan range on both the sides. The main attractions in Shimla are The Mall, the Viceregal Lodge, Sankat Mochan Temple, Tattapani, Lakkar Bazaar. 

Shimla is also famous for its outdoor activities which include adventures activities such as as golfing, skiing, fishing and skating. The grace and color of this beautiful place makes you completely indulged.

Hotels in Shimla, Near to the Mall 
Shimla mall is the one of the most visited by travelers who visit Shimla which is surrounded by good restaurants and hotels on the streets of Shimla which gives a glance of scenic beauty of Shimla. Travelers and tourist wish to stay around the mall area, as there are many options available for lodging close by to the Mall. Hotel Sangeet is the top rated hotel which is located around the mall. The hotels is just situated 1KM from the railway station of Shimla. 

Hotels in Shimla - Circular Road 

Hotel Himland East, which is located on circular road in shimla is one the best hotel which prices starting from Rs.2300. Hotel Himland East has a rating of 2 and is recommended by all the guest who have stayed here. The online prices of this hotel is very low depending on the season and advance booking. 

Hotels in Shimla - Lakkar Bazzar 

Hotel Auckland which is located in Lakkar Bazzar and located close to the mall, Victory tunnel and the railway station. The price of hotels starts from Rs.1100 per night.
